com.magnet.android.mms.async.tag

Class GeoLocationTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magnet.android.mms.async.tag.GeoLocationTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tag

    public class GeoLocationTag
extends Object
implements Tag
    Get the last known location from a passive provider. This tag requires either the FINE_LOCATION or COARSE_LOCATION permission.

      • getKey

        public String getKey()
        Retrieve the tag name.
        Specified by:
        getKey in interface Tag
        Returns:
        Always returns "Geolocation".

      • getValue

        public String getValue()
        Retrieve the last known location from a passive provider. It returns null if permission is not granted or no last known location is available; otherwise, it returns an RFC-5870 formatted string as "geo:lat,lng,alt,crs=wgs84,u=acc". If a passive provider is not desired, override this method with a different implementation.
        Specified by:
        getValue in interface Tag
        Returns:
        An RFC-5870 formatted geo location, or null.
        See Also:
        format(Location)

      • format

        public static String format(android.location.Location loc)
        Format the specified geo location for this tag. The location must have latitude, longitude, altitude and accuracy.
        Parameters:
        loc - A geo location.
        Returns:
        An RFC-5870 formatted geo location.
